description:
All welcome to join us for our annual Christmas Data Beers\* social. We'll confirm venue nearer the time, but most likely a pub in or around the Old Market area of Bristol.

We'll aim for somewhere that's not too expensive and serving food so anyone planning to get dinner while out should be able to do so.

Please note that this is an informal social with no speakers.

\*Beer drinking not mandatory, we pick venues with a reasonable range of alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages!
title: Christmas Data Beers
